transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><b>Control Logic:</b></span></div><div style=""><br></div><p></p><li data-start="15" data-end="34"><p data-start="17" data-end="34" value="<b>Hard Constraints (must-pass)</b>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="135" x="1257.5" y="454.37" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ycNrqOXTRl3BhKUi8Qzm-6" parent="1" Validity (Lexicon-based)</p></li><li data-start="21" data-end="43"><p data-start="23" data-end="43">Lexical Cost (Gradient CEFR Penalty)</p></li><li data-start="21" data-end="43"><p data-start="23" value="<b>Soft Constraints (threshold-based, ratio acceptance)</b>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="182.5" x="1506.25" y="444.37" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="ycNrqOXTRl3BhKUi8Qzm-16" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<li data-start="21" data-end="43"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Lexical Rarity Score (Corpus-based)</span></li><li data-start="21" data-end="43"><p data-start="23" data-end="43">Morphological Complexity Ratio</p></li><li data-start="21" data-end="43"><p data-start="23" data-end="43">Clause Count&nbsp;</p></li><li data-start="21" data-end="43"><p data-start="23" data-end="43">Average Word Length</p></li>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="170" x="1512.5" y="544.37" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
